PUT Update Password User


This endpoint update specific user password.


URL


PUT
 
http://nusantara-mall.org/index.php/api/users/password/(:user_id)


Example Request


curl 
http://nusantara-mall.org/index.php/api/users/password/9
 -H 
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
 -d 
oldPassword=12345
newPassword=abc
confirmNewPassword=abc
  -X 
PUT






Example Response


Success response:


{
    
status
: true,
    
totalResults
: 1,
